title: Voices of Dissent: Hungarian Medea - Iron Bars
description: This first English translation of Hungarian Medea, based on the Euripidean tragedy, and the black comedy, Iron Bars, reveals to the English reader the power and range, and the universality of the characters, of Arpad Goncz, one of Hungary's foremost playwrights.
author: Árpád Göncz
